body:
### Preparation
```bash
. share/spack/setup-env.sh
```

### Issue

Loading a module via
```bash
spack load zlib
```

works, but if one adds the absolute path to the spack executable, it fails with:
```bash
$(pwd)/bin/spack load zlib
==> Error: 'module' object has no attribute 'print_help'
```

ccing @alalazo
title: spack load with absolute path: module error
